title: User (v4) response
description: Response object structure from the endpoint: https://route4me.com/api.v4/user.php

member_first_name.title: Member First Name
member_first_name.description: The first name of the user

member_last_name.title: Member Last Name
member_last_name.description: The last name of the user

member_email.title: Member Email
member_email.description: E-mail address of the user that was used for website registration.

member_zipcode.title: Zip code
member_zipcode.description: The 5-7 digit ZIP code (minimum length of 5)).

member_type.title: Member Type
member_type.description: Member type, ENUM [PRIMARY_ACCOUNT, SUB_ACCOUNT_ADMIN, SUB_ACCOUNT_REGIONAL_MANAGER, SUB_ACCOUNT_DISPATCHER, SUB_ACCOUNT_PLANNER, SUB_ACCOUNT_DRIVER].

member_phone.title: Member Phone
member_phone.description: A phone number of the user.

SHOW_ALL_VEHICLES.title: Show All Vehicles
SHOW_ALL_VEHICLES.description: Show all vehicles, ENUM['TRUE', 'FALSE']. HTTP method - POST.

member_picture.title: Member picture
member_picture.description: A link to Member's image file

level.title: Level
level.description: Subordination level. 0 is the highest level.
